thread.title: WATCH: Luis Enrique Snaps At Reporter After Barcelona's 4-0 Defeat To PSG
thread.title_full: WATCH: Luis Enrique Snaps At Reporter After Barcelona's 4-0 Defeat To PSG

title: WATCH: Luis Enrique Snaps At Reporter After Barcelona's 4-0 Defeat To PSG
text:
WATCH: Luis Enrique Snaps At Reporter After Barcelona's 4-0 Defeat To PSG Wed Feb 15 2017 01:11:51 GMT+0000 (GMT) Wed Feb 15 2017 01:11:51 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
Following Barcelona's 4-0 defeat to Paris Saint Germain last night, Luis Enrique snapped during his post-match interview after admitting that he "accepts all the responsibility for the loss." 
Goals from Angel Di Maria, Edinson Cavani and Julian Draxler sealed a historic win at the Parc des Princes, as Lionel Messi and co. looked on in complete and utter disbelief. 
Barcelona looked shellshocked during the defeat, and manager Luis Enrique was clearly stunned after one of the Catalan giants' biggest defeats in European competition. Luis Enrique apparently had to be held back from confronting a TV3 reporter after fiery interview in the flash zone - Kieran Canning (@KieranCanning) February 14, 2017 
You don't have to understand Spanish to understand his clear frustration: 
" 'It seems you don't watch the game very well, because we changed from 4-3-3 to 4-5-1 during the game. But regardless, we could have done it perfectly, and you would have said the same. 
I'd like the same kind of treatment when we win, and the same personal treatment from yourself - I'd like you to maintain your line of questioning when we win, OK?' 
Here is the clip. Just look at his body language: 
Here is the full three minute interview: ECTV: "3 people held Luis Enrique back after interview because he was going for Jordi Grau (interviewe) again." :open_mouth: pic.twitter.com/yArrb9f7HO - M•A•J (@UItraSuristic) February 15, 2017 
Can Barcelona salvage their slim Champions League hopes? Or is it over for Luis Enrique's side? 
Let us know your thoughts. Sponsored Links
